body_html:
So we can't put TF specific code in stream executor because StreamExecutor is being opensourced separately from TensorFlow, so whatever solution we choose has to work more generally. If they are happy with the environment variable approach, we could add it.

StreamExecutor was never really designed to co-exist well with other processes, unfortunately.
